recipesJson.name: Dumbledore.... Bearded No. 1
recipesJson.author: dazcole
recipesJson.description:
Based on fictional character Albus Dumbledore from the Harry Potter movies this character loves sherbet lemons so why not give homage to this and re create his favourite past time.
This is a very simple but flavourful recipe that really captures that fizzy zing you get from sherbet lemons, I‚Äôve been really enjoying this vape for it being slightly unusual and more a novelty than something complex that I‚Äôd usually create. I hope you enjoy it as much as me.

Here are a few notes;

VT Sherbet 

By far the best sherbet flavour out there very real to its flavour and captures some fizz very well, it doesn‚Äôt taste like burnt sugar either when you vape it. Excellent flavour that should be useful in other recipes if requiring something with fizz.

FE Lemon

Again a perfect combination no other lemon comes close it‚Äôs bright and vibrant and it‚Äôs versatile in many combinations both fruits to bakeries. Feel free if you want more lemon in here to add more it will work.

WF Sour Ball Candy (SC)

I used this as the base sherbet lemons have that hard candy outer and this does the job while adding additional experience to the sherbet to what can only be described as a mouth explosion!!!

TFA Marshmallow 

Added here at a small amount to create additional mouthfeel and a rounder to the citrus flavours.
